title: Yemen: 'The status quo is no longer feasible', analyst says
summary: Saudi Arabia warned Saturday (December 27) it would back Yemen's government in any military confrontation with separatist forces and urged them to withdraw "peacefully" from recently-seized provinces. The statements came a day after reported Saudi air strikes on separatist positions in Yemen's Hadramawt province. For more analysis, FRANCE 24's Liza Kaminovâ€¦
contentText: Saudi Arabia warned Saturday (December 27) it would back Yemen's government in any military confrontation with separatist forces and urged them to withdraw "peacefully" from recently-seized provinces. The statements came a day after reported Saudi air strikes on separatist positions in Yemen's Hadramawt province. For more analysis, FRANCE 24's Liza Kaminov is joined by Mohammed Al-Basha, Founder of Basha Report, a US-based risk advisory firm.
